items.name: contact-form
items.title: Contact Form
items.description: A complete contact form with name fields, phone with country selector, email, message textarea, and file attachment.

changelog.1.2.5: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
changelog.1.2.6: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.1.2.7: Fixed missing popover dependency for shadcn CLI installation
changelog.1.2.8: Extracted country data to separate countries.ts file
changelog.1.2.9: Show demo data when rendered without props

items.name: event-card
items.title: Event Card
items.description: Display event information with multiple layouts. Supports events with images, signals, vibe tags, and display-formatted date/time. Entire card is clickable.
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with default, compact, horizontal and covered variants. Supports physical, online, and hybrid events with signals and vibe tags.
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Simplified Event interface - replaced startDateTime/endDateTime with display-formatted dateTime string, removed image/locationType/onlineUrl, changed ticketTiers to string array
changelog.3.0.0: Added image support to Event type and default variant for displaying cover images.
changelog.4.0.0: BREAKING: Removed View button from all variants. Entire card is now clickable.
changelog.4.1.0: Added image display to horizontal (list) and compact (carousel) variants
changelog.5.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from Event interface. Use array index for key.
changelog.5.0.1: Added accessibility support with role, tabIndex, keyboard handlers, and aria-label for all card variants
changelog.5.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
changelog.5.0.4: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
changelog.5.0.5: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
changelog.5.0.6: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation
changelog.5.0.7: Added demo/data.ts to registry for proper installation via shadcn CLI
changelog.5.0.8: Removed unused OpenAI types side-effect import
changelog.5.0.9: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.5.0.10: Removed unused button from registry dependencies
changelog.5.1.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided

items.name: event-list
items.title: Event List
items.description: Display events in grid, list, or carousel layouts. Fullscreen mode shows interactive split-screen map with Leaflet and animated filter panel.
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with grid, list and carousel layouts. Includes pagination support.
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Updated to use simplified Event interface with display-formatted dateTime
changelog.3.0.0: Updated grid variant to show 3 cards with images and View More button. Added onViewMore action.
changelog.4.0.0: BREAKING: Added fullwidth variant with split-screen map layout. Updated to 15 events. Added coordinates to Event type.
changelog.5.0.0: BREAKING: Fullwidth is no longer a variant - use fullscreenComponent instead. Map now uses real Leaflet.
changelog.5.1.0: Added animated filter panel with Category, Date, Neighborhood, Price, and Format filters. Filters apply to both list and map markers.
changelog.5.2.0: Added expand button next to title in list and carousel variants with onExpand action
changelog.5.2.1: Fixed event-card dependency resolution for shadcn CLI installation
changelog.6.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from Event interface. Use array index for selection and key.
changelog.6.0.1: Added aria-labels to navigation buttons, carousel dots, filter close, and expand buttons for accessibility
changelog.6.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
changelog.6.0.4: Removed Next.js dependency - now uses React-only lazy loading for map components
changelog.6.0.5: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
changelog.6.0.6: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
changelog.6.0.7: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation
changelog.6.0.8: Added demo/data.ts to registry for proper installation via shadcn CLI
changelog.7.0.0: BREAKING: Removed onPageChange, onViewMore, onExpand, onFilterClick, onFiltersApply actions. Filters and expand are now internal.
changelog.7.0.1: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.7.0.2: Extracted shared map utilities to shared.tsx and fixed Leaflet CSS deduplication
changelog.7.1.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided
changelog.7.1.1: Fixed react-leaflet Invalid hook call errors by using React.lazy instead of useEffect dynamic imports

items.name: event-detail

items.description: Full event detail view with organizer info, interactive map, policies, and ticket purchase. Fullwidth mode only.

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with image carousel, organizer info, location, policies, FAQs, and ticket purchase.
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Updated to use simplified Event interface with display-formatted dateTime and string ticketTiers
changelog.2.1.0: Moved Get Tickets CTA from sticky bottom to end of content for fullscreen mode.
changelog.2.2.0: Changed CTA buttons and map tooltip from orange to dark theme colors
changelog.3.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from EventDetails, Organizer, and tier interfaces. Use array index for key.
changelog.3.0.1: Added aria-labels to image navigation, share, save, and back buttons for accessibility
changelog.3.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
changelog.3.0.4: Removed Next.js dependency - now uses React-only lazy loading for map components
changelog.3.0.5: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
changelog.3.0.6: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
changelog.3.0.7: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation
changelog.3.0.8: Added demo/data.ts to registry for proper installation via shadcn CLI
changelog.3.0.9: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.3.0.10: Extracted shared map utilities to shared.tsx and fixed Leaflet CSS deduplication
changelog.3.1.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided
changelog.3.1.1: Fixed react-leaflet Invalid hook call errors by using React.lazy instead of useEffect dynamic imports

items.name: ticket-tier-select
items.title: Ticket Tier Select
items.description: Ticket tier selection with quantity controls and order summary. Shows price breakdown with fees.
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with ticket tier cards, quantity controls, price breakdown, and order summary sidebar
changelog.1.1.0: Added optional event image above order summary. Order summary now always visible with fixed width.
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Refactored to use nested event object (event.title, event.date, event.image, event.currency) instead of flat props
changelog.2.0.3: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
changelog.3.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from TicketTier interface, made name and price optional.
changelog.3.0.1: Simplified TicketSelection interface by removing tierIndex
changelog.4.0.0: BREAKING: Removed onSelectionChange action. Tier quantity changes are now internal.
changelog.4.0.1: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.4.1.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided

items.name: event-confirmation
items.title: Event Confirmation
items.description: Order confirmation with event details, ticket delivery info, organizer follow, and social sharing.
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with success message, event details, organizer follow, and social sharing
changelog.1.0.3: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Removed onChangeEmail action and Change email link
changelog.2.0.1: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.2.1.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided

items.name: hero
items.title: Hero
items.description: Landing hero section with optional logos, title, subtitle, CTA buttons, and tech logos footer. Supports image or text logos with separator.
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with logos, title, subtitle, CTA buttons, and tech logos footer
changelog.1.1.0: Added card wrapper, text logo support, improved light/dark mode compatibility
changelog.2.0.0: BREAKING: Changed button props from string labels to HeroButton objects with optional label and icon
changelog.2.0.1: Image logos now display without bordered container, text logos remain in bordered square
changelog.2.1.0: Added urlLight prop for dark mode logo variant support
changelog.2.1.1: Reduced logo image height for better visual balance
changelog.2.1.2: Removed default content data - component only renders explicitly provided data
changelog.2.1.3: Replaced key={index} with stable content-based keys for tech logos
changelog.2.2.0: Added demo data defaults - component renders demo content when no data prop is provided
changelog.2.2.1: Fixed import type for verbatimModuleSyntax compatibility

items.name: event-shared
items.title: Event Shared Utilities
items.description: Shared utilities for event components (Leaflet map helpers, signal badges).
items.author: MNFST, Inc

changelog.1.0.0: Extracted shared map utilities and signal badges from event-list and event-detail
changelog.1.0.1: Replaced useReactLeaflet hook with React.lazy to fix Invalid hook call errors

items.name: manifest-types
items.title: Manifest Types
items.description: Shared type definitions for Manifest UI components.
items.author: MNFST, Inc
